question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/natives/cryptography/algebra/arithmetics/scalar_mul.rs] [Function: feature_flag_of_group_scalar_mul()] [Feature flag bypass] Can an attacker craft type arguments that cause feature_flag_of_group_scalar_mul() to return None while still allowing cryptographic operations to proceed, bypassing the feature flag security mechanism and enabling unauthorized curve operations?
